## db-connection-mysql package

Implementation of <i>X2 Framework</i>'s database connection provider for <i>MySQL</i> compatible databases.

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createMySQLDatabaseConnectionProvider(app, options)](./db-connection-mysql.createmysqldatabaseconnectionprovider.md) | Create database connection provider. |
|  [mySQLDatabaseConnectionProvider(options)](./db-connection-mysql.mysqldatabaseconnectionprovider.md) | Returns service binder for the MySQL database connection provider. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [FieldInfo](./db-connection-mysql.fieldinfo.md) | Descrpitor of a field that comes from the database (e.g. <code>SELECT</code> query result set). |
|  [GeometryValueArray](./db-connection-mysql.geometryvaluearray.md) | Array of database <code>GEOMETRY</code> type values. |
|  [MySQLConnectionOptions](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.md) | Database connection options. |
|  [MySQLConnectionPoolOptions](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionpooloptions.md) | Database connection pool options. |
|  [PointValue](./db-connection-mysql.pointvalue.md) | Database <code>POINT</code> type value. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AuthSwitchHandler](./db-connection-mysql.authswitchhandler.md) | Authentication switch handler function. |
|  [GeometryValue](./db-connection-mysql.geometryvalue.md) | Database <code>GEOMERTY</code> type value. |
|  [TypeCastFunc](./db-connection-mysql.typecastfunc.md) | Custom type caster function. |
|  [ValueType](./db-connection-mysql.valuetype.md) | Database value type. |

## Remarks

The implementation supports [MySQL](https://www.mysql.com/) (versions 5.6 and up), [MariaDB](https://mariadb.org/) (versions 10.0 and up) as well as [Amazon Aurora](https://aws.amazon.com/rds/aurora/)<!-- -->.

Uses [mysql2](https://www.npmjs.com/package/mysql2) module for the underlying functionality.
